p: One gram of powdered dried leaves and 5 mL methanol (70%) were transferred to a centrifuge tube and shaken at 120 rpm for 24 h. Then, the samples were centrifuged at 4000 rpm for 15 min, and the supernatant was used for quantification of phenolic compounds. The obtained methanolic extract was diluted with deionized water at a ratio of 1 to 30 and stored at −20 °C.
